Package com.vernalis.knime.mmp

Provides Data containers and fragmentation types and methods for Matched Molecular Pair related nodes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FragmentKeyFingerprinted
    This interface provides the API methods required for Attachment point environment fingerprinted FragmentKeys.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BondIdentifier
    A class to hold the start and end atom IDs together, along with the bond ID at time of creation.
    CombinationFinder
    This method finds the number of combinations of objects in a list, returning them as a Set of Sets Adapted from http://codereview.stackexchange.com/questions/26854/recursive-method -to-return-a-set-of-all-combinations
    DefaultFragmentKeyFingerprinted
    This class provides the default implementation of the FragmentKeyFingerprinted interface.
    FragmentKey
    A simple class to hold the fragment key as an ArrayList, which is then sorted and concatenated to a multicomponent SMILES
    FragmentKey2
    A simple class to hold the fragment key as an ArrayList, which is then sorted and concatenated to a multicomponent SMILES
    FragmentKeyMorganFP
    This class extends the FragmentKey class, adding a Morgan fingerprint rooted at each attachment point.
    FragmentValue
    Simple container class to hold an ID string and SMILES String together and allow comparison and sorting for use in HashSet etc
    FragmentValue2
    Simple container class to hold an ID string and SMILES String together and allow comparison and sorting for use in HashSet etc
    Leaf
    This class provides a canonicalisation mechanism for single-attachment point SMILES strings, and also record the index of the incoming attachment point
    MatchedPairsMultipleCutsNodePlugin
    This is the eclipse bundle activator.
    MMPConstants
    A variety of constants and default settings values for the MMP plugin
    MolFormats
    Abstract container class for the list of acceptable input formats for MMP nodes
    MulticomponentSmilesFragmentParser
    Takes a multi-component smiles string, with n+1 components.
    RDKitFragment
    This class provides some static convenience methods for the fragmenting of molecules and the conversion of fragmented molecules to MMP transforms.
    RDKitFragmentationUtils
    Class providing utility methods around the use of RDKit for fragmentation
    RdkitTypeConvertors
    Utility class containing static methods for converting RDKit types to Java Types
    RDKitUtils
    Class providing utility methods around the use of RDKit
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FragmentationTypes
    Enum containing the fragmentation patterns provided in the node dialog.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RowExecutionException
    Runtime Exception to allow passing of the error upwards within a ColumnRearranger so that the Row information may be attached.

Package com.vernalis.knime.mmp Description

Provides Data containers and fragmentation types and methods for Matched Molecular Pair related nodes.
